item.title: 联合信贷银行的 Orcel 称德国商业银行的潜在收购需要时间
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）表示，他并不打算立即收购德国竞争对手德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG），这为紧张的跨国对峙平添了几分平静。【原文：UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said he isn’t planning an imminent takeover bid for German rival Commerzbank AG, inserting a measure of calm into a tense cross-border standoff.】

item.title: 塞内加尔预计明年初首次运输液化天然气
item.description: 塞内加尔能源部副部长谢赫-尼亚内（Cheikh Niane）表示，预计 "明年初 "英国石油公司（BP Plc）的 Greater Tortue Ahmeyim 液化天然气项目将装运第一批货物。【原文：Senegal expects the first cargo from BP Plc’s Greater Tortue Ahmeyim liquefied natural gas project at the “beginning of next year,” according to Deputy Energy Minister Cheikh Niane.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特大型炼油厂点火，维托尔、特拉菲古拉成为主要买家
item.description: 维托尔集团（Vitol Group）、特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）和英国石油公司（BP Plc）是尼日利亚拉各斯附近丹格特（Dangote）新巨型炼油厂燃料的主要买家，该炼油厂正在重塑非洲和欧洲的石油贸易。【原文：Vitol Group, Trafigura Group and BP Plc are the dominant buyers of fuels from Nigeria’s giant new Dangote oil refinery near Lagos that’s reshaping petroleum trading in Africa and Europe.】

item.title: 台湾通胀率以 2021 年初以来最慢速度攀升
item.description: 台湾的通胀率以 2021 年 3 月以来最慢的速度上升，但这不太可能说服央行放弃鹰派立场。【原文：Inflation in Taiwan increased at the slowest pace since March 2021, though that is unlikely to convince the central bank to abandon its hawkish stance.】

item.title: 阿联酋 Adnoc 公司与德国 SEFE 公司达成 15 年液化天然气供应协议
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.）同意向德国 SEFE 公司出售液化天然气，自 2028 年起为期 15 年。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. agreed to sell liquefied natural gas to Germany’s SEFE for 15 years starting 2028, a deal that expands the United Arab Emirates’ efforts to become a key supplier of the fuel.】

item.title: 本田表示，特朗普对墨西哥征收关税将影响美国进口
item.description: 本田汽车公司的一位高管周三表示，对从墨西哥进口到美国的汽车征收关税可能会影响数千辆汽车的交付，因为选票仍在不断滚动。【原文：Tariffs on cars imported into the US from Mexico may impact the delivery of thousands of vehicles, a Honda Motor Co. executive said Wednesday, as ballots were still rolling in.】

item.title: 抵制呼吁发出后，可口可乐在土耳其和巴基斯坦的销量下降
item.description: 由于中东冲突和经济放缓，该地区呼吁抵制被认为与以色列有关联的品牌，可口可乐公司在土耳其和巴基斯坦的销售额出现下降。【原文：Coca-Cola Icecek AS saw a drop in sales in Turkey and Pakistan due to calls in the region to boycott brands with perceived links to Israel amid conflict in the Middle East and an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 尽管里夫斯的预算案带来不确定性，M&S 仍实现了利润增长
item.description: 玛莎百货集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc）公布上半年利润大幅增长，同时警告上周英国预算案提高税率后的不确定性。【原文：Marks & Spencer Group Plc reported a strong rise in profit in its first half, while warning of uncertainty after taxes were raised in last week’s UK budget.】

item.title: 对特朗普有利的选票不断增加，特朗普交易在整个市场爆发
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二晚迅速给金融市场打上了自己的印记。随着关键摇摆州的选票不断向他倾斜，使他处于重返白宫的边缘，所有屡试不爽的特朗普贸易把戏都爆发了。【原文：Donald Trump quickly put his stamp on financial markets Tuesday night. As the votes piled up in key swing states in his favor, putting him on the cusp of returning to the White House, all the tried-and-true Trump Trade plays erupted.】

item.title: 印度节庆促进汽车和自行车销售，婚礼季成关注焦点
item.description: 强劲的节日需求刺激了上个月的汽车销量，在一定程度上缓解了今年消费普遍低迷的局面。【原文：Strong festival season demand boosted sales of automobiles last month, offering some relief from the broad-based consumption slump this year.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单跃升，提振陷入困境的制造业
item.description: 德国 9 月份的工厂订单激增，这对工业部门来说是一个积极的信号，该部门的长期疲软可能即将结束。【原文：German factory orders surged in September, a positive signal for the industrial sector whose prolonged bout of weakness may be coming to an end.】

item.title: 清晨之前的夜晚
item.description:
交易员们先是投入了特朗普的交易，然后考虑得更周全了，结果一出来，他们又投入了

。【原文：

Traders first put on the Trump trade, then thought better of it, and then dove back once the results started to come in

】

item.title: 阿联酋年度最大 IPO 露露网吸引 370 亿美元订单
item.description: 大卖场连锁运营商露露零售控股公司（Lulu Retail Holdings Plc）在阿布扎比首次公开发行股票，募集资金 17.2 亿美元，吸引了价值 370 亿美元的订单，这是阿拉伯联合酋长国今年最大的一次上市。【原文：Hypermarket chain operator Lulu Retail Holdings Plc drew orders worth $37 billion for its $1.72 billion Abu Dhabi initial public offering, the United Arab Emirates’ largest listing of the year.】

item.title: 德意志银行将印度分行监管资本增加三分之一
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）将其监管资本增加了 33%，从 2023 年起达到 3000 亿卢比（35.6 亿美元），这是该银行近年来对印度最大的一次资本分配，因为它押注于这个世界上人口最多的国家的增长潜力。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG made its largest capital allocation to India in recent years by increasing its regulatory capital 33% to 300 billion rupees ($3.56 billion) from 2023, as it bets on the growth potential of the world’s most populous nation.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑创 2023 年 3 月以来最大跌幅，英国股市将反弹
德国商业银行寻求下一次回购，上调全年业绩展望
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）上调了全年业绩展望，并申请再次回购股票，以抵御竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的主动求购。【原文：Commerzbank AG raised its full-year outlook and applied for another share buyback as it seeks to fend off an unsolicited approach by rival UniCredit SpA.】

item.title: 印度央行行长称立场转变并不意味着立即降息
item.description: 印度央行行长表示，货币政策立场的放宽并不意味着下一次会议就会降息。【原文：India’s central bank governor said an easing in the monetary policy stance doesn’t mean interest rates will be cut at the very next meeting.】

item.title: 贷款人称，无美元支付系统将为非洲节省 50 亿美元
item.description: 非洲大陆最大银行的商业银行业务主管表示，在非洲跨境交易中取消美元支付的支付系统可以为非洲大陆节省多达 50 亿美元的处理成本。【原文：A payment system that eliminates the dollar in cross-border African transactions can save the continent as much as $5 billion in processing costs, the head of business and commercial banking at the continent’s biggest bank said.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行业绩超出预期，债务交易商表现出色
item.description: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）公布的第三季度利润高于预期，原因是该行债务交易员的表现优于竞争对手。【原文：Credit Agricole SA posted higher-than-expected third-quarter profit as the bank’s debt traders outperformed rivals.】

item.title: 特朗普大获全胜 "漫画在中国股价飙升，"哈里斯 "漫画股价下跌
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选投票中扩大领先优势，一家在普通话中听起来像 "特朗普大获全胜 "的中国公司股价大涨，而一家听起来像卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的股票则下跌。【原文：Shares of a Chinese company that sounds like “Trump wins big” to Mandarin speakers jumped as Donald Trump widened his lead in the US presidential vote, while a stock that sounds like Kamala Harris declined.】

item.title: 信贷市场发出数周来最多看涨信号
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中取得领先后，从亚洲市场的初步走势来看，信贷市场将迎来几周来最好的一天。【原文：Credit markets were headed for their best day in weeks judging from initial moves in Asia, after Donald Trump took an early lead in the US presidential election.】

item.title: 决策指南》：波兰通胀和预算赤字使利率保持不变
item.description: 在通胀加速和预算赤字扩大的情况下，波兰可能会延长暂停加息的时间，因为投资者正在等待央行就何时开始宽松政策给出新的指导意见。【原文：Poland is likely to extend an interest-rate pause amid quickening inflation and a widening budget deficit as investors await fresh central bank guidance on when easing may begin.】

item.title: 摩根大通将通过区块链提供即时美元-欧元结算服务
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）不久将通过其 Kinexys 区块链平台为美元和欧元之间的外汇兑换提供即时结算服务，并计划逐步增加英镑服务。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. will soon offer instant settlement for foreign-exchange conversions between the dollar and the euro via its Kinexys blockchain platform and plans to add sterling to the service over time.】

item.title: 全球最大的钴矿产商对电动汽车金属的未来持悲观态度
item.description: 世界第一大钴矿产商对金属在电动汽车电池中的作用日益缩小敲响了警钟。【原文：The world’s No. 1 cobalt miner is sounding the alarm over the shrinking role of the metal in electric vehicle batteries.】

item.title: 小盘股大选之夜涨幅最大，选票滚滚而来
item.description: 周二，随着关键州的投票结束，美国股票期货攀升至盘中高点，股市中风险最大的部分波动最大。【原文：US equity futures climbed to session highs on Tuesday as polls closed in key states, with the riskiest parts of the stock market posting the biggest swings.】

item.title: 特朗普早早领跑引发恐慌，香港股市和人民币大跌
item.description: 美国大选的早期结果显示唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领先，这对人民币和股市构成了沉重的压力，因为交易商担心贸易紧张局势加剧会带来影响。【原文：Early US election results showing Donald Trump’s lead are weighing heavily on the Chinese yuan and stocks as traders fear the fallout from heightened trade tensions.】

item.title: 亚洲开始试探性抵御美元大选强势
item.description: 由于大选的波动加剧了美元的飙升，使整个地区的货币承压，一些亚洲国家当局已经开始采取行动保护本国货币，而另一些国家则处于待命状态。【原文：Some Asian authorities are already moving to guard their currencies while others are on standby, as election volatility fuels a surge in the dollar that has put currencies across the region under pressure.】

item.title: 特朗普在早期投票中领先，香港股市拖累亚洲股市走低
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中提前取得领先，在香港上市的中国科技股下跌，拖累日本以外的亚洲股市早盘下跌。【原文：Asian stocks outside of Japan declined in early trading, dragged down by losses in Hong Kong-listed Chinese technology shares as Donald Trump took an early lead in the US presidential election.】

item.title: 市场倾向于特朗普获胜，新兴货币下滑
item.description: 由于交易商开始对唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国总统大选的前景进行定价，新兴市场货币走软。【原文：Emerging-market currencies weakened as traders started to price in the prospect of Donald Trump winning the US presidency.】

item.title: 分析师认为美国民调结果将影响中国股市和美元走势
item.description: 分析师认为，中国股市和美元是最有可能受到美国大选结果影响的资产之一。【原文：Chinese stocks and the dollar are among the assets that are most likely to be affected by the outcome of the US election, according to analysts.】
